segments.text: I see the mess in this kitchen starting with the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere, soaking the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in it, and she doesn't even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are pilfering cookies like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks rickety and gross with all that water nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron is probably getting wet too, unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is widening, what a sloppy disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies in an open jar, attracting who knows what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is tidy, unlike this filth inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate while ignoring the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just revoltingly careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wouldn't want to clean up after them.
segments.speaker: PAR
